short_summary: "Language Training Services; Training - staff of Centre for Health Promotion
description: This Standing Offer (SO) focuses on providing French language training sessions to the employees of the Centre for Health Promotion at the Public Health Agency of Canada. With a focus on delivering French training (oral, reading and writing) and test preparation for staff of varying levels to assist employees in fulfilling their bilingual requirement. The period of the Standing Offer is from Standing Offer award to March 31, 2026, with two (2) additional one (1) year option periods. The training will take place virtually or at Centre for Health Promotion’s location of work at 785 Carling Avenue, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0K9."
